name: Lechero Game
description:
The city has been invaded!

The game begins in the year 1997 where a young milkman walks through the dark streets of the city. He never imagined that his night work would lead him directly to a strange creature.

The people rumored that an unknown object was falling from the sky, hearing a loud sound in the distance.

you are a milkman, deliver the milk before the beast eats you!! Controls:
